item.title: What are value types in Swift?
item.description: What are value types? Value types play a central role in programming languages by grouping data values. `Value type‚Äù is a type of data copied when assigned to a new variable. struct Storage { var data: String = "some data" } let originalStorage = Storage() var copiedStorage = originalStorage // `originalStorage` is copied to `copiedStorage` How can you pass value types? You can pass value type by copying value. struct Storage { var data: String = "some data" } let originalStorage = Storage() var copiedStorage = originalStorage // `originalStorage` is copied to `copiedStorage` copiedStorage.
